VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Oats?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Oats is arc {Potatoes}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Sugarcane?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Sugarcane is arc {Potatoes}.

Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Oats to Sugarcane in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Oats and Sugarcane in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Oats and Sugarcane is {941}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Potatoes and Oats in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Potatoes and Oats is {535}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Sugarcane?
SC.A: The total flow output from Sugarcane is {1344}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Sugarcane?
SC.A: The total flow input by Sugarcane is {1047}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 594? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {941} from {Sugarcane} to {Oats}, a flow of {772} from {Oats} to {Sugarcane}, a flow of {654} from {Potatoes} to {Oats}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 594? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {535} from {Oats} to {Potatoes}, a flow of {403} from {Sugarcane} to {Potatoes}, a flow of {275} from {Potatoes} to {Sugarcane}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 469 and 713? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {654} from {Potatoes} to {Oats}, a flow of {535} from {Oats} to {Potatoes}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Potatoes to Sugarcane or from Sugarcane to Oats?
NC.A: The flow from {Sugarcane} to {Oats} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Potatoes to Sugarcane, from Oats to Potatoes, or from Oats to Sugarcane?
NC.A: The flow from {Oats} to {Sugarcane} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Sugarcane}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Oats} and {Sugarcane}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Potatoes, Arc Oats, Arc Sugarcane}.
